typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Active_YN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ValidatedSalesUnitCode@ValidSalesUnitCode select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit,
		Active_YN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB split(not(isNull(Sales_Unit_Code)) && trim(Sales_Unit_Code) != '',
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedSalesUnitCode@(ValidSalesUnitCode, InvalidSalesUnitCode)
InvalidSalesUnitCodeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidSalesUnitCode
ValidatedSalesUnitCode@InvalidSalesUnitCode derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Sales Unit Code")) ~> InvalidSalesUnitCodeerrormessage
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidSalesUnitCode union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as string,
		Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedDatesAndNumbers@ValidDateAndNumber, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndNumbers split(not(isNull(Derived_Project_ID)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Project_Weighting)),not(isNull(Derived_Project_Weighting)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Expected_Completion_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Expected_Completion_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Planned_Completion_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Planned_Completion_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)),not(isNull(Derived_Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDatesAndNumbers@(ValidDateAndNumber, InvalidDateOrNumber)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID),
		Derived_Project_Weighting = toShort(Project_Weighting),
		Derived_Expected_Completion_Date = toDate(Expected_Completion_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Planned_Completion_Date = toDate(Planned_Completion_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Current_Progress_Perc_Complete = toShort(Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)) ~> ConvertDateAndNumbers
InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrNumber
ValidatedDatesAndNumbers@InvalidDateOrNumber derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Project ID / Dates / Numbers")) ~> InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrNumber, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
UnionAll sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as string,
		Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(

		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll

	input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,

		Validation_Error as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,

	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error

ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@ValidDateAndTimberSalesIDandNumbers, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidSalesUnit@ValidSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Sales_Month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndTimberSalesID split(not(isNull(Derived_Timber_Sales_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Quantity)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Quantity)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Derived_Production_Cost)),not(isNull(Production_Cost)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Stumpage)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Unit_Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Unit_Stumpage)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Average_Sales_Price)),not(isNull(Derived_Average_Sales_Price)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Quantity)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Production_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Production_Cost)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Budget_Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Budget_Stumpage)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@(ValidDateAndTimberSalesIDandNumbers, InvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Timber_Sales_ID = toInteger(Timber_Sales_ID),
		Derived_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Average_Sales_Price = toDecimal(Average_Sales_Price, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Production_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Budget_Stumpage = toDecimal(Budget_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDateAndTimberSalesID
InvalidDateOrTimberSalesIDOrNumbererrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers

		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidSalesUnit@(ValidSalesUnit, InvalidSalesUnit)

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(

		Executed_By_Entity_2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,
		Termination_Date as date,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as decimal(19,4),
		Contract_Currency as string,

		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Contract_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Execution_Date]\n      ,[Termination_Date]\n      ,[Company_Name]\n      ,[Contract_Value]\n      ,[Contract_Currency]\n      ,[Contract_Type]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity1]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity2]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity3]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n      ,[Contract_ID]\n FROM [relational].[OPS_Contract]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalContractLkp
LookupContract derive(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Contract_ID),"Null Contract ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Contract_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Contract ID not belong to Asset/"),""),
		ContractValueValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal), "Contract Value/", ""),
		ExecutionDateValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date_toDate)),"","Execution Date/"),"Execution Date/"),
		TerminationDateValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date_toDate)),"","Termination Date/"),"Termination Date/"),
		TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Type_of_goods_or_services),"Type of Goods and Services/",""),
		ContractCurrencyValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Contract_Currency),"Contract Currency/",""),
		Entity1ValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_1),"Entity 1/","")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg,
ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg,
ContractValueValidateMsg,
ExecutionDateValidateMsg,
TerminationDateValidateMsg,
TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg,
ContractCurrencyValidateMsg,
Entity1ValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date = Execution_Date_toDate,
		Termination_Date = Termination_Date_toDate,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg, ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg, LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg, ContractValueValidateMsg,
ExecutionDateValidateMsg,TerminationDateValidateMsg,TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg,ContractCurrencyValidateMsg,Entity1ValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Execution_Date)) || not(isNull(Termination_Date)) || 
not(isNull(Contracted_Party_Company_Name)) || not(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract)) || not(isNull(Contract_Currency)) || 
not(isNull(Type_of_goods_or_services)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_1)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_2)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_3))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Execution_Date_toDate = toDate(Execution_Date),
		Termination_Date_toDate = toDate(Termination_Date),
		Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal = toDecimal(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract, 19, 4),
		Contract_ID = toInteger(Contract_ID),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date = Execution_Date_toDate,
		Termination_Date = Termination_Date_toDate,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime_Lkp) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalContractLkp select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date_Lkp = Execution_Date,

		Executed_By_Entity3_Lkp = Executed_By_Entity3,
		Insert_Datetime_Lkp = Insert_Datetime,
		Contract_ID_Lkp = Contract_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectContractLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectContractLkp lookup(Contract_ID == Contract_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupContract

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string ("2020-08-28T06:05:53.4181322Z"),
	CurrentRunDateTime as string ("2020-08-01"),
	WorkbookName as string ("Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx"),
	TabName as string ("Major Severe Incidents"),
	CurrentQuarterDate as string ("2020-06-30"),
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Incident_Type as string,
		Category as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Incident_Type_Code\n      ,Incident_Type\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident_Type\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsIncidentType
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Incident_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Asset_ID\n      ,Fund_ID\n      ,Reporting_Period\n      ,Incident_ID\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalIncident
LookupIncidentType derive(Incident_Type_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp), "Incident Type Lookup Error/", ""),
		Incident_Date_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Date), "Blank Incident Date/", ""),
		Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Severity), "Blank Incident Severity/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Incident_Id),"Null Incident ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Incident_ID_Lkp)),iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Incident ID does not belong to Asset/"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',Incident_Type_Validate_Msg,Incident_Date_Validate_Msg,Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg,ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Incident_Type_Validate_Msg, Incident_Date_Validate_Msg,Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg,LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 &&
(not(isNull(Incident_Id)) || not(isNull(Incident_Type)) || not(isNull(Incident_Severity)) ||
not(isNull(Incident_Description)) || not(isNull(Investigation_Undertaken)) || not(isNull(Incident_Findings)) || not(isNull(Incident_Date))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Incident_Id = toInteger(Incident_Id),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Incident_Date = toDate(Incident_Date),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Incident_Type_Code_Lkp = Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Type_Lkp = Incident_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentTypeLkp
LookupIncidents, SelectIncidentTypeLkp lookup(Incident_Type == Incident_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp, false),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidentType
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalIncident select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Incident_ID_Lkp = Incident_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectIncidentLkp lookup(Incident_Id == Incident_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidents

		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ErrorTable
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Incident_Id as integer,
		Incident_Type as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as date,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Work_Book as string,
		Work_Sheet as string,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsForDelete
SelectColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetRelationalDelete
